_header: O lo mine heart since ye will gone your way
Title(s): ‘Ye wote my wele what shulde y wordis more’
_description: Charles d’Orléans, ‘Ye wote my wele what shulde y wordis more’ — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Lo myn hert syn ye wol gone youre wayAnd leue me soole vnto my
                    lady dere…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Myn hert y nede no more vnto yow lereYe wote my wele what
                    shulde y wordis more
